New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the first Indian to cross 1000-run mark in a calendar year in T20Is
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 61 runs off just 25 deliveries including six boundaries and four maximum at a strike-rate of 244.00
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav has 1026 T20I runs to his name in just 28 innings, with a highest score of 117 and an average of 44.60 including a century and nine half-centuries
Others: Suryakumar Yadav is the second cricketer in the world to achieve the 1000-run mark in a calendar year after Mohammad Rizwan
